title: Tanuki
extract:
Tanuki may refer to:

Tanuki, the Japanese word for the Japanese raccoon dog, a species of canid mammal
Tanuki, a deadwood bonsai technique


See also
Bake-danuki, a type of spirit in Japanese mythology that appears in the form of the Japanese raccoon dog
Tanooki Suit, a raccoon-tailed power-up in the Super Mario video game series
categories: Short description is different from Wikidata
